item.description: We will continue with Nietzsche's The Birth of Tragedy. Our tentative plan is that we will read one more text from Nietzsche (The Antichrist) and then we will move on to Jeremy Bentham ( Introduction to the Principles of Morals and Legislation).
item.how_to_find_us: Send an e-mail with your skype id and e-mail address to the organizer if you have never participated in skype calls before.
item.name: Skype -- Nietzsche: The Birth of Tragedy
